name: Hexagon Defender
description:
Intro

you control a player who is trying to defend their hexagonal base from waves of enemies. to assist you you have a gun and the ability to eat these enemies when they are low on health.

Milk Jam

This game was made in 7 days for the milk jam hosted by 1actose

https://itch.io/jam/milk-jam-1

Controls

the Player will automatically follow your mouse, to shoot press Left Mouse Button. To eat enemies you must dash into them using your Right Mouse Button.

Death

When your player gets to hit you will be teleported back to safety losing a little bit of score. 

When your base gets hit it will send out a shock wave pushing enemies away and your health bar will decrease, when you run out of health the game will be over

Eating Enemies

When you eat an enemy you will gain strength in the field they were strong in. The duration you have their abilities are displayed by the smaller bar under the health bar at the top of the screen

You can eat A enemy when they are constantly emitting Particles Enemy Stats in Depth Red Enemy

This is the most basic but upon eating will grant the player a lot more damage.

Blue Enemy 

This enemy is Strong taking almost no knockback when shot when eaten it will give the player immunity for the duration of the effect.

Green Enemy 

This enemy is a tank taking a ton of shots to take down. when eaten you will get a force field effect protecting you from all attacks.

Yellow Enemy 

This enemy is very fast and weak, eating this one will give you the same speed boost.

Pink Enemy 

This enemy is by far the most unique since it will hunt down the player instead of the base, It will also shoot at the player.  Be careful because this enemy bullet can damage the base. when eaten you will gain the ability to rapidly shoot by holding down left mouse button.

Cyan Enemy 

This enemy is a boss taking a ton of stots to take down as well as having less knockback. Eating this will give you a similar effect to the green enemy.
